programme.title: Radyo Patrol Balita
programme.desc: Radyo Patrol Balita focuses on delivering the latest news, breaking events, and important issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Tandem Ng Bayan
programme.desc: Tandem Ng Bayan brings you discussions on the day's top news stories, providing analysis and engaging in commentary on political as well as social issues.

programme.title: Magandang Buhay
programme.desc: "Momshies" Jolina Magdangal, Melai Cantiveros, and Regine Velasquez kick off the day with good vibes as they share a chat with celebrities on topics easily relatable to Filipino families.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: TV Patrol Express Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Are You G? with MJ Felipe
programme.desc: Are you G with spontaneous adventures? Unfiltered talks? Raw experiences? Heart-to-heart exclusives? Then you're definitely G with MJ Felipe!

programme.title: TV Patrol Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Eva fights to reclaim her place in the wealthy Cortes family while searching for the truth about her identity. Fate brings her together with Inno, and their love story endures family secrets, rivalry and tragedy as they discover the real meaning of forgiveness and redemption.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado

programme.title: The Ghosting
programme.desc: A timid young woman moves into a town where townsfolk talk about an urban legend involving a red house and a little girl carrying a headless doll. When she finally comes across figures in the local lore, she turns to a clairvoyant boy to stop the curse.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 35
programme.desc:
This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a 
loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for 
the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he 
vowed to seek revenge against the influential 
retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 36
programme.desc:
This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a 
loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for 
the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he 
vowed to seek revenge against the influential 
retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.title: Hapi House Season 1 ep 1
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. Ha-pi House is a home away from home for a group of single half-Pinoys and Pinoys born and raised overseas who have come home to rediscover their Filipino roots.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 212
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 8
programme.desc:
Di Na Muli tells the story of a young woman who tries to overcome her 
life's biggest regret (complicated by her special ability to see how much 
time remains of someone’s life) but ends up falling in love with the man 
who caused the death of her one great lov.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 24
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Osyana ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 3
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Operation Break the Casanova's Heart ep 1
programme.desc: After Stephen, the school's casanova, breaks the heart of Naomi's bestfriend, Kryzel, Naomi becomes determined to seek revenge. In her effort to do so, she is discovered by the HSCC (Haters of Stephen Cruz Coalition), a secret group composed of Stephen's ex-girlfriends who seek revenge on Stephen and recruits her on their mission guided by 10 steps to break the casanova's heart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 213
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Beloved
programme.desc: Friendship takes a violent turn when Adora (played by Nora Aunor) finds that she's a pawn in the intriguing games in life and love being played by her employer and close friend Renee (played by Hilda Koronel.).

programme.title: Operation Break the Casanova's Heart ep 1

programme.title: Cuerpo Y Alma ep 5
programme.desc: Maya, a young nurse who has been having terrifying nightmares finds out a horrifying truth about a debt that was made to save her life when she was a child. As she's about to find out, the payment just may cost her much more than her life.

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 12
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 10
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 1
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 1
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 214
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Bea Montenegro ep 2
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. Hot off the heels from her last cold case, investigative journalist Christine Del Mundo (Maui Taylor) is back with a brand new cold case. This time, it involves actress Bea Montenegro, whose death has only brought forth one suspect - a fellow model who suffers from face blindness.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. programme.title: House Of Lies
programme.desc: House of Lies is an intense, family-centered drama about two mothers who face off against each other. Shaped by painful pasts, they clash in a fierce battle marked by betrayal, hidden family secrets, and a fight for survival.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Never Say Die
programme.desc: Never Say Die follows Joey Delgado (Jillian Ward), a principled IT student who runs a vlog spotlighting the quiet heroism of honest police officers-inspired by her father, Major Julio Delgado (Raymart Santiago). programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: House Of Lies
programme.desc: House of Lies is an intense, family-centered drama about two mothers who face off against each other. Shaped by painful pasts, they clash in a fierce battle marked by betrayal, hidden family secrets, and a fight for survival.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Never Say Die
programme.desc: Never Say Die follows Joey Delgado (Jillian Ward), a principled IT student who runs a vlog spotlighting the quiet heroism of honest police officers-inspired by her father, Major Julio Delgado (Raymart Santiago). Her views are challenged when a viral expose by Andrew Dizon (David Licauco), a sharp and cynical investigative vlogger, paints her father as corrupt and gets him suspended. The expose sha

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.title: Fast Talk With Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.title: 24 Oras
programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Pbb Celebrity Collab Edition 2.0
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: Never Say Die

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre

programme.title: Never Say Die

Her views are challenged when a viral expose by Andrew Dizon (David Licauco), a sharp and cynical investigative vlogger, paints her father as corrupt and gets him suspended. The expose sha

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Reporter's Notebook
programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.title: Never Say Die Marathon
programme.desc: Never Say Die follows Joey Delgado (Jillian Ward), a principled IT student who runs a vlog spotlighting the quiet heroism of honest police officers-inspired by her father, Major Julio Delgado (Raymart Santiago). Her views are challenged when a viral expose by Andrew Dizon (David Licauco), a sharp and cynical investigative vlogger, paints her father as corrupt and gets him suspended. The expose sha

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Swindler's List
programme.desc: Leo and Niño were the swindlers in this wacky tale. But only because of a very good reason: to provide a home for the orphanage. The duo decided to raise money by swindling the rich to give to the poor.

programme.title: Alfredo Lim: Batas Ng Maynila
programme.desc: This film is based on the life story of policeman Alfredo Lim who rose from street cop to director of the National Bureau of Investigation and eventually Mayor of the City of Manila.

programme.title: Ang Misis Kong Hoodlum
programme.desc: When Andy marries Grace, he is surprised to discover that her family are staying with them. Andy becomes the \"house-band\" and serves his wife and her family.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Mikee had led a charmed life. Now she was engaged to marry the man who was considered by her rich parents as the most suitable for their daughter. But Mikee wanted more out of life.

programme.title: Pangako Ng Kahapon
programme.desc: Set in the picturesque abaca plantations of Bicol with the perfect Mayon Volcano in the background, this is a film about a greedy family, corrupt politicians and the hapless tenants whose lives crossed their path.

programme.title: Pilya
programme.desc: Ditas has the body of a full-grown adult but her sense is that of a child. Although she exists in an environment where vulgarity is deemed normal, she maintains her wide-eyed innocence.

programme.title: Reputasyon
programme.desc: What a nice schoolgirl like Miya Brown (Mia Nolasco) doing in a club as G.R.O.? She has learned that there is life beyond her mother's world and that of her father's.

programme.title: Isla
programme.desc: Beauty Queen, Maria Isabel Lopez portrayed the role of Isla, the island maiden who has all the males, including her father, lusting after her. Her dream was to leave her primitive surroundings and find another life in the big city.

programme.title: Laruan
programme.desc: Joy (Carmi Martin) has only one ambition in life--to get rich and give her family a more comfortable life. She enslaves herself to William (Mark Gil) in her hope that he will help her achieve her goal.

programme.title: Sana Dalawa Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: A young man who was engaged to be married found himself attracted to another woman. Lacking the nerve to call off the wedding, he went through with the ceremony hopeful that his bride would give him the strength to avoid his other love.

programme.title: Talahib At Rosas
programme.desc: Heiress Anjanette Abayari, who had just arrived from the US, was abducted by rebels while on her way home to see her father. Experienced tracker Cesar Montano, who was serving time in jail, was released to find her in exchange for his freedom.

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang
programme.desc: A renewed ex-convict (Robin Padilla) decided to change his friends’ lifestyle after he came out of the jail.

programme.title: Chick Boy
programme.desc: Stars in this comedy about university students living in the fast lane though they cannot afford to. They find work as helpers to a rich woman with three beautiful nieces. Of course they turn on the charm for the girls and their aunt.

programme.title: Megamol
programme.desc: A rich old lady, who was dying, hired a detective agency to go in search of her long lost granddaughter. Lacking the manpower for the job, janitor Andrew E was passed off as a private detective.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Mahal Ko
programme.desc: The King of the Philippine Movies and the Star for All Seasons team up in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy. FPJ and Vilma Santos meet in the most bungling of situations and they become fast enemies.

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Bukas May Pangarap
programme.desc: A peasant couple set all their worldly possesions so that the husband can take advantage of an overseas job offer. But a tragedy is bound to bring his marriage and family life to ruin.

programme.title: Bruce Liit
programme.desc: Bruce (Niño Muhlach) is eager to learn karate specially when he sees his father practice. But Miguel (Ramon Zamora) keeps on postponing his son's instruction deeming Bruce too young to appreciate the principles behind this particular vocation.

programme.title: Ang Pumatay Ng Dahil Sa'yo
programme.desc: Sergeant Emilio Sanchez is a dedicated military man. He believes that Filipinos should stand on their own and not be taken by the Americans.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: Trabaho Lang Dear, Walang Personalan
programme.desc: Former carnival workers Leo and Amanda were trying to make a living by doing all sorts of jobs. From Dyesebel and Babaing Gagamba, Amanda was now a security guard by day and a nightclub bunny by night.

programme.title: Sgt. Ernesto Baliola: Tinik Sa Batas
Urban Rangers
programme.desc: Urban warfare could be as dangerous as being in a battle zone. This was discovered by a group of young idealistic new graduates from the police academy who were unjustly sent to prison because they refused to condone the corruption in the force.

programme.title: Ang Boyfriend Kong Gamol (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alice Dixson plays a rich woman who returns in the country with a plan to reach out to the poor and stop poverty. She decides to disguise herself so she can penetrate the poor community and in the process she meets Andrew E and falls in love with him despite their social differences.
